timeoff_id.description: The ID of this time off

timeoff_type_id.description: The ID of this time off type

start_date.description: Start date of this time off

end_date.description: End date of this time off

start_time.description: Start time of this time off in 24 hr format

hours.description: Number of hours per day for this time off. Not required when a full day

timeoff_notes.description: Additional notes about the time off

repeat_state.description: Frequency that this timeoff repeats. `0` = No repeat, `1` = Weekly, `2` = Monthly, `3` = Every two weeks, `4` = Every three weeks, `5` = Every six weeks, `6` = Every two months, `7` = Every three months, `8` = Every six months, `9` = Yearly

status.description: Status of the time off. `1` = Tentative, `2` = Confirmed

repeat_end.description: Date that the repeating time off will cease

full_day.description: Is this time off for a full day? `1` = Yes, `0` = No

people_ids.description: List of people IDs assigned to this time off

modified_by.description: Account ID of the person who last modified this record

created_by.description: Account ID of the person who created this record
